title: 3nj Symbol Computation Numerical Stability
description: Computation of large 3nj symbols may suffer from numerical overflow/underflow issues, particularly for high j values where factorials become extremely large.
impact: Could produce incorrect results for high angular momentum calculations critical to LQG

title: Closed Form Approximation Validity Range
description: Closed form expressions for 3nj symbols are approximations with unknown validity ranges. Need rigorous error bounds and convergence analysis.
impact: Could give incorrect results outside validity range without warning

title: Symmetry Property Verification
description: All symmetry properties of 3nj symbols (Regge symmetries, etc.) need systematic verification in closed form implementation.
impact: Symmetry violations would indicate fundamental errors in implementation

title: Asymptotic Behavior Accuracy
description: Asymptotic expansions for large j may not be accurate enough for precision applications requiring exact angular momentum coupling.
impact: Could accumulate errors in large-scale angular momentum calculations

title: Memory Usage Optimization
description: Storage and computation of large arrays of 3nj symbols may exceed available memory for realistic problem sizes.
impact: Limits problem sizes that can be practically addressed
